Grimwire 0.1.0

A User-Driven Web OS.

Structured

Grimwire uses Web Workers and RESTful messaging to create a program architecture in the browser. Leverage a promises-based Hypermedia API to integrate loosely-coupled components.

Learn More »

User-Driven

Grimwire's fully client-side toolset allows applications to be added, modified, and reconfigured without reloading the page. Turn your site into a platform and let users control their software.

Learn More »

Multi-Threaded

Grimwire's applications consist of Web Workers configured together using JSON, keeping the document thread clear of userland software. Take advantage of the latest HTML5 APIs without ever writing client-side code.

Learn More »

Decentralized

Grimwire's roadmap includes permissions policies and WebRTC integration, moving toward host-independent, realtime social computing. Protect your privacy and take full advantage of the Web.

Learn More »

Open-Source

Grimwire is released under the MIT license and is free to deploy on any host.
